GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.34
GSD.description:
arch/arm64: Fix topology initialization for core scheduling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 87f5d66daa5f457449bb95d6b8d18bb7596aa627, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 9edeaea1bc452372718837ed2ba775811baf1ba1. For more details please see the references link.
